title: Soupateria - Garibaldi
typeOfFood: Lacto, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Bulgarian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located in the heart of Sofia, at Soupateria you'll find 6 types of hot and tasty soups daily, made ​​from old recipes adapted to your taste. Serves between 2 and 4 vegan dishes per day. Vegetarian food too. Be sure to try the fresh salads, fresh sandwiches with crusty bread and sweet temptations - all made ​​with love in the spirit of true home cooking. Open 24h.
